replies.body:
@ AndresJR23

Haven't really ever talked to you but you seem like a neat guy! If you ever see me on team speak or in game, feel free to poke me and we can have a chat!

@ SamuelJacob9

I found out about Avicus by looking for servers with the key word "break the obsidian" XD.

Probably a dog :)

You're cool and really chill. I haven't really ever talked to you, but we should sometime!
